sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { FaPiggyBank, FaBullseye, FaChartLine, FaCalendarAlt, FaDollarSign} from 'react-icons/fa'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; // passing on the dashboard data from App.js, lesser API calls, faster loading. function Dashboard ({ sessionData, dashboardData, onReload}) { const navigate = useNavigate() // Refresh dashboard data when component mounts (when navigating to Dashboard) useEffect(() => { if (onReload) { onReload(); } }, []); // Empty dependency array = runs only on mount const goals = dashboardData?.data || [] const goalProgress = dashboardData?.goal_progress || [] const totalSavings = dashboardData?.total_savings || 0 const totalGoals = dashboardData?.goal_count || 0 // format currency of amount from backend const formatCurrency =(amount) => { return new Intl.NumberFormat ('en-NZ', { style: 'currency', currency: 'NZD' }).format (amount || 0) } // formate date from SQL to frontend format const formatDate = (dateString) => { return new Date(dateString).toLocaleDateString('en-US', { year: 'numeric', month: 'short', day: 'numeric' }); }; const calculateProgress = (saved, target) => { if (!target || target === 0) return 0; return Math.min((saved / target) * 100, 100); }; // Show loading if dashboardData is null (still loading) if (!dashboardData) { return (

Loading your dashboard...

); } return (
{/* Header */}

Welcome {sessionData.username} !

Track your savings progress and financial goals

{/* Summary Cards */}

Total Savings

{formatCurrency(totalSavings)}

Active Goals

{totalGoals}

Average Savings Progress

{goalProgress.length > 0 ? Math.round(goalProgress.reduce((sum, goal) => sum + calculateProgress(goal.goal_saving, goal.goal_amount), 0) / goalProgress.length) : 0}%

{/* Goals and Savings Section */}

Your Goals & Savings

{goalProgress.length === 0 ? (
ðŸŽ¯

No Goals Found

Start by creating your first financial goal!

) : (
{goalProgress.map((goal, index) => (

{goal.description || `Goal ${index + 1}`}

{formatDate(goal.target_date)}
Target Amount: {formatCurrency(goal.goal_amount)}
Saved Amount: {formatCurrency(goal.goal_saving)}
Progress {calculateProgress(goal.goal_saving, goal.goal_amount).toFixed(1)}%
Remaining: {formatCurrency(Math.max(0, (goal.goal_amount || 0) - (goal.goal_saving || 0)))}
))}
)}
{/* Quick Actions */}

Quick Actions

{/* main page container below */}
); } export default Dashboard
